com.swirl

Class Signal

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.swirl.SObject
      • com.swirl.Signal
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Beacon, Region, WifiInfo

    public abstract class Signal
extends SObject
    Signal is the abstract base class for signal objects: beacon, wifi network, region.

        See Also:

      • getAttributes

        public org.json.JSONObject getAttributes()
        If resolved, returns the custom attributes associated with this signal. These attribute mappings occur through the Swirl platform.
        Returns:
        the JSONObject representation of attributes or null

      • getLabels

        public java.lang.String[] getLabels()
        If resolved, returns the custom labels associated with this signal. These label mappings occur through the Swirl platform.
        Returns:
        the String array of labels

      • getAttachments

        public java.util.ArrayList<Attachment> getAttachments(java.lang.String type)
        If resolved returns the set of attachments that match the type specifier. Pass a string will match the 'namespace/type' as a prefix unless you pass a string which begins with a slash as in '/type' in which case it will match if the type ends with '/type'
